mutants.code:
def reverse_list(lst):
    n = len(lst)
    i = 1
    j = n - 1
    while i < j:
        (lst[i], lst[j]) = (lst[j], lst[i])
        i += 1
        j -= 1
    return lst

def reverse_list(lst):
    n = len(lst)
    i = -1
    j = n - 1
    while i < j:
        (lst[i], lst[j]) = (lst[j], lst[i])
        i += 1
        j -= 1
    return lst

def reverse_list(lst):
    n = len(lst)

    while i < j:
        (lst[i], lst[j]) = (lst[j], lst[i])
        i += 1
        j -= 1
    return lst

def reverse_list(lst):
    n = len(lst)
    i = 0

    while i < j:
        (lst[i], lst[j]) = (lst[j], lst[i])
        i += 1
        j -= 1
    return lst

def reverse_list(lst):
    n = len(lst)
    i = 0

    while i < j:

        i += 1

def reverse_list(lst):
    n = len(lst)
    i = 0

    while i <= j:

        i += 1

def reverse_list(lst):
    n = len(lst)
    i = 0
    j = n - 1
    while i >= j:
        (lst[i], lst[j]) = (lst[j], lst[i])
        i += 1
        j -= 1
    return lst

def reverse_list(lst):
    n = len(lst)
    i = 0
    j = n - 1
    while i != j:
        (lst[i], lst[j]) = (lst[j], lst[i])
        i += 1
        j -= 1
    return lst

    n = len(lst)
    i = 0

    while i < j:
